content.rendered:
SCOUTING SERVICES

Find out if we can provide service to your property with a free scout.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. Request your scout using the form below.
2. Our technicians will visit your property and find out if you are serviceable.
3. You will be informed of the results.

ONCE WE KNOW THE RESULTS OF THE SCOUT, HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO PROCEED?

SCOUT

I’d like to receive
the scout results so that
I can decide on service and sign up for installation on a later day.

SELECT

SCOUT & INSTALL

If I’m a good candidate for an install, I’d like to have my service installed immediately while the techs are on site for the scout.
SELECT
  • You would not need to be home.
  • The scout is free and we will not ask for a payment method.
  • Please note that a technician will be climbing up on your roof as part of the scout.
  • You would need to be home for the appointment.
  • We will ask for a payment method during the signup process, but you will not be charged unless we actually install you.
  • If we install service, you will be charged $100 for the install fee, plus the amount for the speed plan you select.

ONCE WE KNOW THE RESULTS OF THE SCOUT, HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO PROCEED?

SCOUT

I’d like to receive scout results so that I can decide on service and sign up for installation on a later day.

SELECT
  • You would not need to be home.
  • The scout is free and we will not ask for a payment method.
  • Please note that a technician will be climbing up on your roof as part of the scout.

SCOUT & INSTALL

If I’m a good candidate for an install, I’d like to have my service installed immediately while the techs are on site for the scout.
SELECT
  • You would need to be home for the appointment.
  • We will ask for a payment method during the signup process, but you will not be charged unless we actually install you.
  • If we install service, you will be charged $100 for the install fee, plus the amount for the speed plan you select.

WANT TO SPEAK WITH US DIRECTLY?

Call Us

970-340-8100

EMAIL US

support@ascentbb.com

Send us a message

    Ascent Broadband

    Ascent leads Northern Colorado in providing cutting-edge, high-speed wireless internet. Stop settling for spotty internet service and start experiencing what a high-quality connection can do for you. Our goal is to make your internet experience as seamless as possible—delivering superior wireless technology at a fraction of the price of our competitors.

    OUR PLANS

    Coverage Area

    We are continuing to expand our excellent network.

    Check out our latest coverage map.

    VIEW MAPS
